name: hexagon granny stocking
notes:

there's something so magical about waking up on christmas morning and finding a festive stocking filled with goodies.  and making my own stocking is one of my favorite ways to add handmade charm to my home. plus, the best part is that this beautiful design is a quick and easy project that you can whip up in no time. so, get your crochet hooks and christmas spirit ready because a memorable and cozy holiday season is just one granny hexagon away!

our granny hexagon stocking comes with a full pattern and a helpful video tutorial. following along has never been easier.

> your grandmother's cozy blankets, it's

join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and embark on a holly jolly crochet-along journey. 

there are two choices of granny hexagons! crochet 12 per stocking. then we will join with a flat slip stitch and add a special ribbing at the top. last, top it off with a leather hanging strap and a christmas tree ornament for extra charm.


✨ extra support & tips: ✨
✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube
✔️ join a community of crocheters

✨ what you will need to make  a granny hexagon stocking✨

yarn:
[brava tweed worsted][1]
97% premium acrylic, 3% viscose, 218yds/100g.
weight: 4 worsted
colorways shown: wren, wasabi, & mink
yarn quantities
traditional:  1 skein each wren, wasabi, & mink
puff:  2 skeins wren, 1 skein mink
yarn substitutions listed in pattern.

notions:
[scissors][2]
[yarn needle][3]
[removable stitch marker][4]
[wood blocking board][5]
[wooden beads][6]
[cinnamon stick][7] (or regular stick)
[string][8]

crochet hook:
[g (4.0mm) crochet hook][9]
